Shoe - Class in com.nickeson.game.cardgame
Title: Shoe.java

Project: cardgames

Description: A Shoe of Cards for use in card games

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

Shoe() - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
default constructor builds a 6-Deck Shoe
Shoe(int) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
convenience constructor to build a Shoe with a specific number of Decks
Shoe(int, Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
convenience constructor to build a Shoe with a specific number of Decks, which are built using options from a Map we pass in
showCard(Card) - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Hand
Does not remove Card from Hand - returns(shows) Card if it exists in Hand
shuffle() - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Deck
shuffle the Deck
shuffle() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
add Card(s) from discards pile back to Shoe, shuffle the Shoe
shuffle() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
add Card(s) to Deck from discards pile, shuffle the Deck
size() - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Deck
 
size() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Hand
returns the number of Cards in the Hand
size() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
returns the number of Decks in the Shoe
size() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
returns the number of Cards in the Deck
sortBySuit() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Hand
Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same suit are grouped together, and within a suit the cards are sorted by value ascending.
sortByValue() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Hand
Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same value are grouped together, and within a value the Cards are sorted by suit - values proceed in an ascending fashion
StdDeck - Class in com.nickeson.game.cardgame
Title: StdDeck.java

Project: Blackjack

Description: A Standard Playing Card Deck using options from DeckOptions

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

StdDeck() - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
default constructor builds a Standard Deck with 0 Jokers
StdDeck(Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
convenience constructor allows us to pass an options Map and build Deck using options from the Map
